TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SKPixelGeometry extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes how LCD strips are organized for each pixel.

remarks.para: Description of how the LCD strips are arranged for each pixel. If this is unknown, or the pixels are meant to be "portable" and/or transformed before showing (e.g. rotated, scaled) then use Unknown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPixelGeometry BgrHorizontal = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Pixels are made up horizontal blue, green and red lights.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPixelGeometry BgrVertical = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Pixels are made up vertical blue, green and red lights.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPixelGeometry RgbHorizontal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Pixels are made up horizontal red, green and blue lights.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPixelGeometry RgbVertical = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Pixels are made up vertical red, green and blue lights.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPixelGeometry Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Use if the order is not knownÂ or the pixels are meant to be "portable" and/or transformed before showing (e.g. rotated, scaled).
